# UMAP transition


2014年までにリリースされたポケモンだけでUMAP、みたいなのを毎年分やる

```{r}
years_seq <- seq(as.Date("2009-01-01"), length = 15, by = "years")

umap_transition <- umap_input_factor_id |> 
  as.data.frame() |> 
  map2(
    .y = years_seq,
    ~ filter(
      .data = .x,
      <.y
      )
  )
  uwot::umap(verbose = TRUE, 
    n_threads = 6,
    metric = list("euclidean" = umap_input_factor_cols[1:2],
                  "categorical" = umap_input_factor_cols[3:42])
  )
```
